---
agent: agent
---
Use MCP to analyze the open security vulnerabilities from code scanning (using github server mcp), create a vulnerability assessment report against the OWASP top 10 in markdown format and include links to the open vulnerabilities as well as their descriptions and relevant sources.

use colors and emojis to indicate severity of vulnerabilities, action items and headings

include the date and time in the report and also in the name of the report file markdown file


do not suggest fixes automatically
